name: Advanced Xmas Cracker Simulator
description:
Merry Xmas 2017 - Enjoy Advanced Xmas Cracker Simulator, the most sophisticated simulation of cracker pulling every seen on the Spectrum.

A game for 2 players.

When the game says go, player one must press key 'z' as quickly as possible. Player two must do the same with key 'm'. The cracker will break at a certain point, faster fingers win the prize!
